name: chidori (ThousandBirdsInc)
description: [项目级] A reactive runtime for building durable AI agents。来源: https://github.com/ThousandBirdsInc/chidori

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A reactive runtime for building durable AI agents

来源: https://github.com/ThousandBirdsInc/chidori
语言: Rust
Stars: 1335

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
The following example shows how to build a simple agent that fetches the top stories from Hacker News and call the OpenAI API to filter to AI related launches and then format that data into markdown.

------

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
cargo +nightly install chidori-debugger --locked
```

If you prefer to use a different python interpreter you can set PYO3_PYTHON=python3.12 (or whichever version > 3.7) during
your installation to change which is linked against.

name: chidori/deployment 模块
description: [模块级] chidori 项目的 deployment 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ThousandBirdsInc/chidori

genes.title: deployment 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: deployment/
类型: source
文件数: 9

包含文件:
- deployment/README.md
- deployment/docker-single-container
- deployment/docker-single-container/Dockerfile
- deployment/docker-single-container/example_agent
- deployment/docker-single-container/example_agent/example.md
- deployment/docker-single-container/init.sh
- deployment/docker-single-container/litellm_config.yaml
- deployment/telemetry
- deployment/telemetry/README.md

name: chidori/toolchain 模块
description: [模块级] chidori 项目的 toolchain 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ThousandBirdsInc/chidori

genes.title: toolchain 模块说明
genes.content:
curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh
rustup toolchain install nightly
